here...\""},{"lineNumber":145652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿言え。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't be stupid."},{"lineNumber":145653,"originalJapaneseLine":"　邪魔する奴は殺すと相場が決まってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a given that anyone who gets in my way will be killed.\""},{"lineNumber":145654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、そうだ、サテラの使徒なら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, yes, if you're Satella's give.\""},{"lineNumber":145656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、行くぞ！　ランス！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, let's go! Lance!\""},{"lineNumber":145657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様の行く手を塞ぐ奴は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyone who blocks my way,"},{"lineNumber":145658,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わんわんの糞以外踏み潰ーーーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"except dog poop, will be crushed!\""},{"lineNumber":145659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……好戦的だなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Quite aggressive.\""},{"lineNumber":145660,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がラング・バウに到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others arrived at Lang Bau."},{"lineNumber":145661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お待ちしておりましたっ、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've been waiting for you, Lance-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":145662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、シーラ。俺様が来たぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo, Sheila. I'm here.\""},{"lineNumber":145663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":145664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、余裕綽々だな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really, you're so relaxed...\""},{"lineNumber":145665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、赤髭」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, Red Beard.\""},{"lineNumber":145666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、ヘルマンに来ている魔人、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon who has come to Helman now,"},{"lineNumber":145667,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな余裕で相手できるほど軽い相手じゃないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is not an opponent you can take on so easily.\""},{"lineNumber":145668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、サテラに聞いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I heard from Satella."},{"lineNumber":145669,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンクって奴だろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's that guy called Kessel Link, right?\""},{"lineNumber":145670,"originalJapaneseLine":"「厄介な奴だぜ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He's a troublesome fellow...\""},{"lineNumber":145671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「情けねぇが、お前だけが頼りだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's pathetic, but you're our only hope."},{"lineNumber":145672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気ィ引き締めて当たってくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Brace yourself and take him on.\""},{"lineNumber":145673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、まずは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, first of all...\""},{"lineNumber":145674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、作戦会議ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, is this a strategy meeting?\""},{"lineNumber":145675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、寝る」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'm going to sleep.\""},{"lineNumber":145676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":145677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラング・バウまで来るだけで疲れたわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just coming to Lang Bau tired me out."},{"lineNumber":145678,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さー、部屋に案内しろ、シーラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, lead me to my room, Sheila.\""},{"lineNumber":145679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐふふ、それから奴隷としての","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gufufu, and then,"},{"lineNumber":145680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仕事もしてもらおうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll have you do your work as a slave too...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すまなかったね……」
「お前ら警備隊かなんかだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys are the guards or something, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それならこんなとこでウダウダしとらんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so, instead of dawdling around here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事しろ、仕事」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: get to work, get to work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ、それが……
この先の道を魔物が塞いでいて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are monsters blocking the road ahead...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするべきか話し合っていたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were discussing what we should do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなもん倒せばいいだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just defeat them, that's what you should do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、とんでもない……
我々警備隊ではどうにもならない強さで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are so strong that our guards can't handle them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「通常なら軍隊に始末してもらうのだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Normally, the military would deal with them, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は魔軍との戦争でそれどころではないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, with the war against the demon army, there's no time for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁー、どうしたもんか……」
「知らん」
「ほんと、男には冷たいんだから……」
道を塞ぐ魔物の話を聞いてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After hearing about the monsters blocking the road,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警備隊と別れて街道を真っ直ぐに進むと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: parting ways with the guards, I proceeded straight along the highway,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐにそれと分かる魔物と遭遇した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and soon encountered monsters that were clearly those.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こいつらか……」
「ひえーっ、で、でかくて怖いだす……」
「ら、ランス様、ここは遠回りして……」
「馬鹿言え。
邪魔する奴は殺すと相場が決まってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a given that anyone who gets in my way will be killed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、そうだ、サテラの使徒なら
そう答えるのが正しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the correct answer to give."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、行くぞ！　ランス！」
「俺様の行く手を塞ぐ奴は
わんわんの糞以外踏み潰ーーーす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: except dog poop, will be crushed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……好戦的だなぁ」
ランス達がラング・バウに到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others arrived at Lang Bau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お待ちしておりましたっ、ランス様」
「よう、シーラ。俺様が来たぞ」
「はいっ」
「まったく、余裕綽々だな……」
「む、赤髭」
「今、ヘルマンに来ている魔人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon who has come to Helman now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな余裕で相手できるほど軽い相手じゃないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not an opponent you can take on so easily."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、サテラに聞いた。
ケッセルリンクって奴だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's that guy called Kessel Link, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「厄介な奴だぜ……」
「情けねぇが、お前だけが頼りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's pathetic, but you're our only hope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気ィ引き締めて当たってくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brace yourself and take him on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、まずは……」
「はい、作戦会議ですか？」
「いや、寝る」
「ラング・バウまで来るだけで疲れたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just coming to Lang Bau tired me out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さー、部屋に案内しろ、シーラ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, lead me to my room, Sheila."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ、それから奴隷としての
仕事もしてもらおうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have you do your work as a slave too..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon who has come to Helman now,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not an opponent you can take on so easily."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's that guy called Kessel Link, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「厄介な奴だぜ……」
「情けねぇが、お前だけが頼りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's pathetic, but you're our only hope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気ィ引き締めて当たってくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brace yourself and take him on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、まずは……」

「いや、寝る」
「ラング・バウまで来るだけで疲れたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just coming to Lang Bau tired me out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さー、部屋に案内しろ、シーラ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, lead me to my room, Sheila."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ、それから奴隷としての
仕事もしてもらおうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have you do your work as a slave too..."
